countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary - there have been a significant number of attacks in Kabul in recent months, including on the Afghan news agency and military bases and convoys
countries.name: Afghanistan

countries.change_description: Latest Update: Local laws and customs section - homosexuality is decriminalised and anti-discrimination legislation is in place; Health section – removal of advice about haemorrhagic fever
countries.name: Albania

countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary and Terrorism section – reports of an attempted suicide bomber being shot and killed in Tizi Ouzou on 23 March 2016
countries.name: Algeria

countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary – cases of locally transmitted Zika virus have been confirmed in the last 2 months; you should follow the advice of the National Travel Health Network and Centre and discuss your travel plans with your healthcare provider, particularly if you’re pregnant or planning to become pregnant
countries.name: American Samoa

countries.change_description: Latest update: this advice has been reviewed and re-issued without amendment
countries.name: Andorra

countries.change_description: Latest update: Summary – removal of precautionary security notice for US citizens advising them to avoid locations in Luanda; Entry requirements section – there is currently an outbreak of yellow fever in Luanda and other parts of Angola;  a vaccination is required for travellers arriving from all countries
